faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your desired dates, and choose from the list of available rooms. Click 'Book Now' and fill out the required information. Payment is made via bank transfer, and proof is sent via Telegram for verification.
faqQ2Title: How do I book a hall or training section?
faqQ2Answer: To book a hall or training section, you must first register your company account. Once your account is approved, you can log in, navigate to the 'Halls and Sections' page, select your dates and desired facilities, and submit the booking request.
faqQ3Answer: Currently, we accept payment via direct bank transfer. For dormitory bookings, you will receive bank details after submitting your request. For facility bookings, our team will contact you with an invoice and payment details after your request is approved.
faqQ4Title: Can I book multiple facilities at once?
faqQ4Answer: Yes. If you are logged in as an approved company representative, you can select multiple halls and sections from the 'Halls and Sections' page and book them together for the same date range and service levels.
faqQ5Title: How long does it take for my company registration to be approved?
faqQ5Answer: Company registrations are typically reviewed within 1-2 business days. You will receive an email notification once your account has been approved.
faqQ6Title: What are the check-in and check-out times for dormitories?
faqQ6Answer: Standard check-in time is after 2:00 PM on your arrival date, and check-out is before 12:00 PM (noon) on your departure date. Please contact the building administrator for any special requests.
faqQ7Title: Who should I contact for support?
faqQ7Answer: For technical issues with the website, please use the live chat widget. For questions about your booking, services, or payments, please refer to the phone numbers and email on our 'Contact Us' page.
brochureSubtitle: Your premier destination for professional training facilities and comfortable accommodations in {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: The {siteName} is a leading institution dedicated to providing top-tier educational resources, training facilities, and comfortable accommodations. We aim to support the growth and development of professionals and organizations by offering a state-of-the-art environment for learning, collaboration, and rest.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Comfortable and secure rooms for individuals and groups attending training or events.
brochureHallsDesc: Versatile spaces equipped for conferences, workshops, and meetings of all sizes.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and convenient meal and refreshment services for your event attendees.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more to ensure a productive and comfortable stay.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: A strong commitment to quality and professionalism.
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are ready to assist you with your booking needs. Contact us today to plan your next event or stay.
